thread.title: Nasdaq Biotechnology Index Falls Further
thread.title_full: Nasdaq Biotechnology Index Falls Further - WSJ

author: Dan Strumpf
title: Nasdaq Biotechnology Index Falls Further
text:
Biotechnology stocks tumbled anew, sending the Nasdaq Biotechnology Index deeper into bear-market territory.
The index fell 6% Monday afternoon, extending a loss of 13% last week. The recent declines have sent the index â€‹falling by more than 25% from its all-time high set on July 20, wiping out all of its gains for the year.
The latest slide marks a reversal for a sector that until recently was a star performer. The latest...
